content.rendered:
The Sybil Lamb Archive Room is open to the public for researching or viewing on Wednesday afternoons from 2-4, May through October, and by appointment. Jean Hankins, the archivist, can be reached at 207-539-2521 or jeanhankins@myfairpoint.net. The archives can be used only on site, but copies of most photographs or documents can be made.

Learn More
